observation: UStronics Inc  Skip to content About Contact Request Quote Career Partners Home Products Satellite Phones Satellite PTT Mobile Terminals Maritime Aviation VSAT GPS/ Tracking Markets Agriculture-Forestry Construction-Mining Education Elections Government Humanitarian Media Recreation Scientific Research Sea-Maritime Solutions Bulk SMS mBanking mCurrency mLearning Media Polls mGov mHealth SMS Advertising Social Networking​ Shop Satellite Products Satellite Mobile Terminal IoT Satellite Services Iridium Iridium Subscription services Inmarsat Support 0 Toggle website search Menu Close Worldwide connectivity UStronics Provides worldwide satellite connectivity for two-way, data, voice and messaging communications using satellite phones, mobile hot spots, satellite terminals, smartphone adapters, Internet of Things (IoT) devices, and VSATs. READ MORE Fixed Satellite Communication We are satellite communications services integrated for fixed connectivity, providing  C, Ka and Ku bands spectrum to our customers according to their required application,  supporting higher data rates. Click Here Aeronautical Satcom The high-speed Ka-band satellite broadband connectivity has made a better aero continuity option in the industry. Besides, we support and integrate Ku and L Band terminals for aero applications. Emergency And disaster Response Reliable Emergency Response solutions are available for emergency/business continuity purposes, providing voice and data connections when wired or wireless networks are unavailable to locations during natural or man-made disasters. Mobile Apps & (VAS) Mobile Native apps and SMS value-added services developed for a range of services such as Social networking, mLearning, mGov, mHealth, SMS based advertising and many more services to address consumers needs. UStronics as a system integrator specializes in maritime clients, provide Inmarsat's Global Xpress, worldwide Ka band connectivity in addition to L Band Inmarsat Sailors and Iridium Certus. Assets Tracking Mobile satellite services remain a niche application with high benefits for organizations that needs real time assets tracking solutions which use a low-throughput data for their applications like fleet management and global asset tracking. Internet of things (IoT) IoT connectivity in regions without a landline and cellular networks is a challenge. The availability of higher data throughput rates planned for advanced Mobile Satellite systems increases the technology's viability for additional use cases. Travelers Connectivity Connectivity for travels to remote areas are not an issue any more. Travelers can use portable satellite phones and terminal and have a reliable global voice and data communications with affordable rates. Previous slide Next slide Learn about the latest list of communications products that are used for transmitting and receiving high-speed connectivity devices. We offer technologies for aviation, Land and Maritime application. Seated barbell shoulder press | Exercise Videos & Guides | Bodybuilding.com testosterone for sale read more MARKET Market demand for satellite services is high, due to the adoption of business continuity, and mobility. Satellite services to increase their presence across the enterprise architecture as the bandwidth expands capacity and reduces costs. Affordable, reliable, secure and robust technologies being offered to government agencies to increase the safety and the mission capability of the organization. We offer vital communication solution using native mobile application, SMS based communication technology to deliver services in the area of mGov, mHealth, mLearning, and SMS based applications to address our customers needs. Events Terms of Use Privacy Policy Copyright © 2020 UStronics.com × Cart Notifications

As technology evolves, so do the tactics of scammers. In 2023, over $1.2 trillion was lost to scams, signaling a critical need for heightened awareness. This article unveils the likeliest scams in 2024, from disaster relief to AI-powered schemes, offering insights to help you navigate the evolving landscape of online security. Stay informed and safeguard your digital experiences from potential threats. Read on to find out the most likeliest of Scams you can encounter in 2024. Read More ScamAdviser in Your Browser Never get scammed (again) with the power of ScamAdviser in your browser with our free extension that informs you in real time whether a website is likely to be legitimate or a scam. The browser add-on is available for Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge, and you can install it on as many devices as you want including those of your family and friends to ensure that everyone is protected. Click the link below to download the free ScamAdviser Browser Extension. Download Now Full review Company Rating We see that the owner of the website is using a service to hide his/her identity. This may be because the owner does not want to get spammed. However, it also makes it difficult to identify the real owner of the website. As a result, websites hiding their identity get a slightly lower score. Webshop Analysis According to Tranco this site has a low Tranco rank. This means that the number of visitors to this website is quite low. You can expect this from a small, starting or niche website. A popular website however should have a higher ranking. Technical Analysis A valid SSL certificate was found. Professional companies use an SSL certificate to encrypt communication between your computer and their website. However, there are different levels of certification and scammers also install a free SSL certificate. If you have to enter your data, never do this without checking if an SSL certificate protects your information. There are fraudsters making all kinds of claims to trap victims online - from fake investment opportunities to online stores - and the internet allows them to operate from any part of the world with anonymity. thought: The Scamadviser review for ustronics.net indicates that the site has a high trust rating and appears safe to use. However, it also notes that the website owner is using a service to hide their identity, and the site has a low Tranco rank, indicating low visitor numbers. While hiding WHOIS data can be a negative sign, it's also common for legitimate businesses. The site has a valid SSL certificate, which is good, but as Scamadviser notes, even scammers can install free SSL certificates. There are no customer reviews on Scamadviser, making it harder to determine the website's reputation based on user experiences. After reviewing the WHOIS information, which shows a long-standing domain registration, and considering the Scamadviser analysis, there is no conclusive evidence to label ustronics.net as a scam website. The characteristics of scam websites listed in the initial brief are not evidently present based on the information gathered. I now know the final answer. Based on the analysis, ustronics.net does not show conclusive signs of being a scam website.

observation.reason: The website has a high trust rating on Scamadviser a valid SSL certificate and a long-standing domain registration with no immediate evidence of scam characteristics such as unusually low prices claims of free money or exploitation of psychological weaknesses. The use of a privacy protection service for WHOIS data is not uncommon for legitimate businesses.
